caption: Really...hungry today.  Ordered Burger, gill onions...Well Done...below is how it came... They gave no option to redo my order...Wow! Requested a refund.  Poor customer service!
Thin crust for the win
Very good food.   Very professional n very polite.  I never had a mess up on my orders.  I recommend this restaurant

Love this place! I have not been here in a long time. I thought it was permanently closed. Turns out I was wrong. So glad it wasn't. I had taste for it today. Love there service always friendly and asking if need any plates, red pepper etc. Can't go wrong with this place.
Great pizza for the price. It was my first time there and whoever was at the register patiently took the time to explain the menu. Very respectful and calls everyone by name. Must try
Great service, friendly staff and was served a massive Italian beef sandwich with steak fries and a drink for a great price!!
Good pizza most of all I like the the friendliness of the staff and the professional service

This was a mass takeout for work (obviously, considering the pandemic), so I'll bring up the best stuff first: the gnocchi with prosciutto is completely worth what you pay for it (tasty and filling), even if the salad and garlic bread were "meh" because it wasn't served entirely fresh. It's probably better in a full-blown restaurant setting (i.e., the one up in Lincoln Park) but as for now it's more than serviceable as a takeout/delivery place.
Great pizza and customer service!!!!

So, so good. Classic Chicago pizza cut in squares, crispy crust, delicious cheese and sausage. Pasta was just as delicious and smelled amazing. We ordered for delivery and they were quick. Will order again!
Best Thin crust pizza in Chicago period!. Super friendly staff and service was awesome 👌.
just ordered two pizzas in the loop..they showed up in maybe 30 min, hot and delicious!  thanks for continuing to be awesome!
My kid love their pizza!

This review was due. I haven’t visited in a while but def due. I tried many pizza like pizza, sandwiches and all was good. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is that I’m very particulate about pizza since I’m lactose intolerant and I don’t like too much bread like Lou Malnati’s. Too much cheese for me, but was good. I order sausage with veggies. They’re good for sure and worth a try and def not over priced like other places.

Excellent pizza! It tastes like quintessential Chicago thin crust. The people are always friendly and they are no-frills which makes them even more of a neighborhood staple. I would absolutely recommend them.
From out of town and saw this place had a good rating and boy is it we'll deserved! Food was amazing
A fav location for delicious Pizza. i love this place. there was fast, efficient, and courteous service. this place has a nice design.
Great customer service.
Great food and very nice people. Thanks guys
The pizza here is much tastier than you'd expect and the staff are very friendly. Don't get the German chocolate cake.

The folks in the South Loop rave about Pat’s Pizza so I figured I’d try it but it was absolutely terrible! It was actually one of the worst pizzas I’ve ever had and I’d give it no stars if that was an option. I ordered a thin crust,  half veggie and half veggie with chicken. The chicken was dry & overcooked and the sauce had an awful flavor. I wouldn’t feed their pizza to my dog. Needless to say, it was tossed after the first couple bites. We’re sticking to Lou Malnati’s and Giordano’s!
Good people
Tried deep dish pizza. It was so good. Better than popular pizza places.
Best thin crust pizza I ever tried
Best mashed potatoes ever. Seriously ever. Also the grilled calamari is amazing! Obviously their thin crust za is fire

Best thin crust pizza in downtown Chicago! I have been enjoying Pat's Pizza for over 20 years and have never been disappointed. Whenever I have served it for a work lunch or a party I always get asked to order again for next function. Service and delivery have always been excellent - whether at lunch, dinner or that late night craving. Plan ahead since they do get busy and sometimes need up to an hour to deliver.

I just called because i live south of the loop a little bit, and they were amazing, i asked for special options with no carbs and they were amazing! I want these awesome people to receive all the credit!!!! They are amazing!

My favorite place to order delivery thin crust pizza from. I always get the Jalepeno poppers, a side salad - cause their ranch is THE best - and some garlic mozz bread too. Delivery is always super quick and friendly. Order directly from the store to avoid taking money away from this awesome small biz. Thanks for making delivery pizza great! Oooo also I love their Alfredo pasta.

I overheard a kid tell his grandpa in the far west suburbs that he loved Pat's Pizza in Chicago and so I finally decided to stop in a month later when I was in the neighborhood. The kid was right on. Great tasting thin crust juicy pizza and I was surprised to see how extra generous they were with the sausage and it was perfectly spiced. It was an 8" pizza for $8, what a great deal. I'm definitely coming back again and now I also know there is a bus stop right at the door of this place.
Nice and fast pizza.
(Translated by Google) # 1 pizza in whom  (Original) #1 pizza in chi
Best thin crust pizza in Chicago.

So I couldn't decide if I wanted a Pat's Special that come with sausage,  onions,  peppers and mushrooms  OR DOUBLE sausage.  Then it struck me....I'll get both! This is half of each that is left after I took this photo. See this location has personal sizes for usually under 9 bucks each. That gets you a free can of soda too. So for 20 bucks I didn't have to decide. I hot both. Now full disclosure this NOT THE ORIGINAL PAT'S. They are up near  Lincoln Park. However this place licenses the name and formula for the crust so it's a close second. YES there is a formula to a crispy light strong enough to hold toppings crust. Pat's has perfected that crust. The thinnest crisp crust allowed to support topping. I took my picky brother here. He ordered double sausage AND pepperoni. I was worried the crust wouldn't support that weight but I was way wrong. For me a pizza should stand on a CRISP CRUST not piled high with sauce that makes everything soggy (cough cough Lou M and big G on a bad day). A crust should crack and crunch when you bite into it without crumbling. They do that here. I will not down YOUR FAVORITE but this is mine. Lincoln Park doesn't do personal size, is far and the hours aren't really conducive to anyone not in that neighborhood but it's a great date place unlike the State street local, more designed to grab and go! So if you are in the south loop, hankering for a decent ZAA, stop by for a personal or whatever size you like. Soda can not shown, I drank them but if you must know I had Root Beer and Ginger Ale. Perfect choices for me when no beer Available which YOU CAN GET in Lincoln Park.
I always have a pleasant experience...
Never miss, always consistent tavern style Chicago pizza
Pretty good pizza. If you're looking for something gourmet or high end you'll want to check elsewhere.
PATS IS AMAZING. The most friendly owner Nick! Service great, food amazing!
Service excellence.  Love the pizza.

Have enjoyed pizza from here before but tonight, the ordering process over the phone, delivery service and pizza itself did not meet previous expectations. First, the phone clerk had an attitude when I was ordering the food while I was reading off a simple two pizza order for my family. Secondly, the delivery man was not able to deliver pizza upstairs like times before, and let me know that I had to come down my 22nd floor apartment building whilst he was already downstairs.... When I came down three minutes later, he wasn’t answering his phone and then saw him walk out the building next to ours. Last but not least, the order came out wrong. I have the receipt and picture to prove it. Just disappointed because I was really excited to get quality service, and it just never followed through. I understand if the restaurant is busy, but treating customers with courtesy and respect is a must.
They don't answer their phones. There is no reason the phone rings 20x, then gets hung up.
Absolutely wonderful thin crust pizza, their ranch dressing is also tasty! Great food and prices. Living in the south loop this is our go to for pizza.
Great ultra thin crust pizza
Good pizza ..very stingy with the sauce..#dobetter
Disgusting service with over confident pizza....
Pats is a small place with great food. The people are cordial and friendly, and everything is reasonably priced.
Extremely fast delivery even on a NFL Sunday. Great thin crust pizza.
Delicious and made to order
Awesome ppl behind the counter. I can always count on them to be open before posted hours.  I order 15 minutes ahead and my food has always been fresh and ready.

Ordered a pan pizza to be delivered to the hotel while ON VACATION, (this is important information) even put it on the special instructions hotel name and room number. Wss delivered before they said it would be HOWEVER was delivered a very thin pizza and it was UNCUT!!!!! If I had been home this wouldn't have been a problem, but was in a hotel had to use plastic forks to try to tear it apart.
Good food
For as busy as it was (we had a 25 minute wait), they really did have great service. You can get on the waiting list and order your drinks and pizza at that time.
Excellent fast pizza. I usually go for their thin crust.
Outstand food
Delivery order was perfect! Love the thin crust pizza. And the fried ravioli... amazing! Will definitely be calling back for pizza again.

In the land of world renowned pizza this one ranked basic which means typical(good).Its a small family owned take out only place that’s been in the same location many years.Ingredients good quality. Service good. Parking for pick up difficult. Pricing expensive.Note a large pizza pats special $35 with tax. AWARDED 2 YUMS ON A SCALE OF 3.
Good food fast
The personal pizza was basically a cracker with cheese on top and one of the employees acted like a lecherous creep. I'm bummed I wasted the calories at this place in a city full of delicious za
Pat's is great.

This place...so good. So sad we moved out of the city solely because we can't have Pat's South Loop as often. I just get plain cheese, which is amazing, and my boyfriend gets pepperoni. He usually likes giardeniera and if that's not an option (it is here) he goes with jalapeños  but didn't like it with either. He is very picky however with that. He loves his pepperoni though! The sausage is also very good. The mozzarella sticks are also great, good amount for the price. We love Pat's!!!
Always a good experience
Good food and homemade cheese! Can't beat that
Take out and delivery only...always consistent .

I went to get me a burger today, usually  I get the happy guy, idk if he is the owner but he is delightful when I pick up my orders but this lady with gray/white hair is rude, first off they always put 1packet of mustard in the bag, I asked for extra she ignored me and took care of someone else, I asked again a stood there for her to go and get over 20 pack of mustard and threw them on the counter as if I was a bother,if your having a bad day that’s not my fault , but better customer service is asked for from that lady , unacceptable

Ordered the beef combo with sweet peppers. Honestly one of my favorite sandwiches I've had. Beef was flavored perfect the sausage was great. The guy behind the counter was friendly and even upsized our drinks for being the first customer of the day. I will definitely be back
Best pizza in the loop, hands down. Savor that flavor.
Almost every Friday for 10+ years
Average prices for acceptable late night grub. Finally a place that can do thin crust in Chicago (not NY, though).
You can't beat their thin crust pizza! And the personal pizzas are a great deal and delish!
Pretty good but need to get the pepperoni
The pizza we purchase today was tasteless very little sausages and the crust stuck to the card board box was not satisfy with your pizza. Ticket # 46514
Delicious
Excellent thin crust pizza. I will make this my go-to pizza place
Danielwiseowl.love.my.work..love.passion.n.seasoning.for.customer.enjoy.my.work..y Arreee
This is the best thin crust pizza I ever had!
Food is always excellent
I love this place, it’s a real Chicago pizza!! Love the thin crust pizza pats style.
I love the thin crust pizza they have here!

We had heard of Pat's Pizza and decided to give it a shot last weekend. While the Pizza was fine, mainly because of the crust I still cannot give this place more than one star because of the service. They might make decent pizzas but that doesn't matter if you simply don't receive what you ordered? When I confronted the server who messed up our order he simply gave me the toppings on the side! Mmmhhhh?!? If I want my toppings on the side then I don't need to order a pizza in the first place! We also were not offered a compensation for the ruined order. In the end there are better pizza places in Chicago like Coalfire or Craft Pizza, just skip this one!!!
Best thin crust in Chicago!
This place is alright. My pizza came out fast, but wasn't anything great. About $18 for a one topping 12" pizza. I don't think I would recommend this place too highly. Good, not great.
There food is good. I love the chicken parmesan dinner.

I’m happy I gave Pat’s a second chance. The first time I had it I was underwhelmed but the second time I really enjoyed it.  It’s not my favorite pizza in Chicago but it is a very solid 4 stars. Slightly higher if I could do that. Very thin tavern style pizza and could put a few more toppings on them. I recommend the giardiniera.
Best thin crust pizza in Chicago.
Great staff, pizza super delicious
Best thin crust Chicago pizza around.  Been a customer for over 5 years.  More times than I can count.

My family has been ordering from this place for 15 years, today's my 20th birthday... guess where I'm ordering from right when they open today? Nothing better than a good thin crust pizza and Pat's always delivers. We live right on the edge of where they deliver, but you'd never know it because of their speedy delivery! I like to think I know good pizza when I taste it, I'm the manager of a pizzeria on Chicago Ave and while it's good, Pat's will always come in as my #1. Keep up the great work!
Great pizza and chicken fettuccine Alfredo .
I found a peice of rat feces in my food when i complained they said cat help you
Great chicken parmesan sandwich
One of the best burgers in the area. Plus excellent customer service!
Go special if you pick up free fries and soda with sandwich s
Great stuffed pizza.
Best thin crust. But get a better ordering system. Sometimes I don't even bother cause you have to give them your full info and CC Everytime and it takes forever. Welcome to the year 2000.
(Translated by Google) The richest pizzas of Chicago a wonder I recommend 100%  (Original) Las pizzas más ricas de Chicago una maravilla lo recomiendo 100%
Great
Had some calamari & chicken parmesan and it was the 💣would recommend this place

The best deal in large affordable burgers.  They also have a great selection of pasta dinners which each come with a choice of soup or salad.  Of course, as the name implies, they also have pizza with a nice selection of toppings.
Good food
Pizza was very good and  Affordable I enjoy my time here
Delicious pizza, wings and fries.
The food here is great.Also they have great    customer service.Pretty quick to
Great
Great pizza and burgers.  The owner was very nice as well.
We love this place especially for pick up!
My order took an hour, my pizza was soggy and room temperature. The girl on the phone was extremely rude
Friendly staff Italian beef is pretty good. Alot of food for the price.
The worst Pizza that you can ever ask for, the workers are super rude, I just can't believe I spend my money here
Horrible customer service the food tastes bad and the owner super cheap... also they overcharge...
I Love Pats pizza!!!
My favorite thin crust pizza in Chicago for 12 years and counting!
Best pie in Chicago... Hands down.
Pizza is absolutely delicious!! Service is fast and friendly too...
This is how they deliver pizza. See photo

I'm from out of town and was told by several employees at a hotel just a block away to try "Pat's." Well the lady that answered was very rude and said they were closed, even though they were open for 20 more minutes. I was walking to pickup just a minute away.   BAD customer service!!!

Horrible service!! Ordered delivery, the manager took my order incorrectly, when I called back to let them know she said,"I don't care, I'm not changing it. You can pay for another pizza." First and LAST time ordering here. Go to Lou Malnati's instead, better pizza, better service.
Great food from the counter, great service
Very friendly owner/staff. Great crispy thin crust pizza. Affordable, especially for downtown. Will definitely be back.
Friendly Staff Good Pizza and tasty
$6 personal pizza with drink is a win for the location being downtown. The pizza was a  decent $6 pizza. Nothing too fancy, just a cheap eat.
Good pizza and the combo sandwich is outstanding.  People are super friendly.

Best mom and pop pizza shop downtown. I highly recommend the chicken parmigiano and the thin crust pineapple and pepperoni pizza. If you are not a fan of pineapples on pizza this place will convert you.
Best thin crust in Chicago!  Quick delivery to the South Loop.
I order pick up and delivery and am happy with the results. Pizza comes hot and always  is tasty!
Best thin crust pizza in the loop - we have been ordering from Pat's since 1999 - always fast and friendly service.
Best Thin Crust in Chicago!!
The pizza is amazing!
My wife and I are repeat customers of Pat's Pizza! The customer service is amazing and the delivery is super speedy! Thanks Pats!
Great first experience. We got a cheese thin crust and the fried ravioli, it was highly enjoyable and we will be back!

Today was my first time trying Pats and the manager treated me as if I had been going to the joint forever. He was unbelievably nice and explained all the neat discounts including student discount. The pizza and garlic bread was also worth keeping this place as my new go-to pizza joint.
Great pizza. the real Pat's.
Delicious thin crust pizza and reasonable prices!
Great food, very good service, and a nice atmosphere.
Best thin crust.
Guy at front counter was very nice and helpful. Pizza was great!!! Crust was thin and sauce had a touch of sweetness... Would recommend if looking for thin style pizza..
Good pizza joint!
The best pizza ever.
Solid thin-crust... too solid
Pretty good pizza.  Surprisingly expensive, but good.

Pat's is a good neighborhood pizza spot. It's affordable and tasty. I usually get the thin crust pizza, and it's nice that they have individual sizes when you don't want to buy a whole pizza. I wouldn't say that it should be a replacement for some of the more popular Chicago pizza places, but if you are in Printer's Row, and Pat's is convenient, give it a try.
Best thin crust pizza in Chicago. Hands down! Try the Pat's special. Delicious! And they deliver to my boat at River City Marina Condos. Boating, Pizza, Beer, well maybe Boating Beer and Pat's Pizza.

Pat's is my go-to pizza delivery place in downtown Chicago for thin crust pizza.  The pizza is perfectly crispy.  The toppings are fresh and flavorful.  It's delivered quickly and the people on the phone are nice.  I wish there were some better coupons or deals at this place.  If that had been the case, I might even order Pat's more often.  I've never been there in person, but I look forward to visiting in person as well.  I'm a big fan and I highly recommend Pat's.
Great Food Freindly StaffOverallMostafaMustapha the best driver in town Fast Service
Delicious thin crust pizza, order is ready in 15-20 minutes, classic Italian staple foods as well as their pizza. Eggplant parmesan sandwich is great!

Pat's is a great South Loop take-out pizza joint. The standard pizzas are good, but the "quattro formaggi" is the way to go. It is a little expensive, but is delicious.  Be sure to grab a menu when you walk in. There are coupons on the back that they'll accept on the spot.
I love Pat's thin crust pizza.   It's ready in 15 minutes of my call for pickup,consistently good every time!
